TEXT.TITLE: COOPER SAYS OFFER MUST INCLUDE CLASS A SHARES
TEXT.BODY: <Cooper Canada Ltd> said it told those who have expressed interest in acquiring control of the company that it would entertain no offer unless it were made to holders both of class A non-voting shares and voting common. Reuter
